title: DRAFT ARIA 1.2 Editable Combobox With List Autocomplete Example
description: This is a test of the DRAFT ARIA 1.2 combobox

results.notes: combobox role was implied by the "collapsed" state + "edit box" role. It could be argued that the combobox role was not conveyed, because the "collapsed" state is a result of aria-expanded rather than the combobox role. However, the absence of an explicit announcement for the combobox role likely will not prevent end users from understanding the combobox behavior of the control because the collapsed state is conveyed along with the text input role.

and_chr.notes: list box does not expand while typing, you must expand it via the button

and_chr.output: each option was conveyed. When the last option received focus, an earcon was made. No other indication of boundaries was given.

results.notes: boundaries implied starting role + earcon at the end

options were flagged with a number

history.message: Added Narrator results for NVDA and JAWS, updated NVDA+Chrome results.
Updated VoiceOver tests to illustrate a bug where aria-activedescendant is not respected when the combobox input has no value.
